DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female , nonsmoking subject . 2 . Willing use contraception throughout duration study 90 day study . 3 . Capable consent . Subjects follow applies exclude study : 1 . Any clinically significant abnormality , infection , exposure infection , recent live virus vaccination , abnormal laboratory test result find medical screening . 2 . History alcohol drug abuse , positive urine drug screen breath alcohol test screening . 3 . History allergic reaction protein kinase inhibitor , significant allergic reaction drug . 4 . Positive pregnancy test screening . 5 . Clinically significant ECG abnormality . 6 . Participation clinical research study involve administration investigational market drug device within 30 day prior first dosing , administration biological product context clinical research study within 90 day prior first dosing , concomitant participation investigational study involve drug device administration . 7 . Use medication topical product without significant systemic absorption : 8 . Donation plasma within 7 day prior dose , significant blood loss within past 56 day . 9 . Subject pregnant , breast feeding .
